Code: EXEC SQL SELECT FONTE, NRRCAP, NRRCAPCO, OPERACAO, DTMOVTO, HORAOPER, SITUACAO, BCOAVISO, AGEAVISO, NRAVISO, VLRCAP, DATARCAP, DTCADAST, SITCONTB FROM seguros.v0rcapcomp WHERE fonte = :FONTE AND nrrcap = :NRRCAP AND operacao IN (100, 110, 310, 320, 500) AND situacao = '0' ORDER BY nrrcapco END SQL
